episodes.title: The Religion Business docuseries - Official Sneak Peak
episodes.description:
The official 'The Religion Business' Sneak Peak teases a powerful, investigative documentary series exposing the deep financial intricacies of the religious and nonprofit sectors-particularly institutional Christianity in the United States. This 7-part docuseries reveals how a $1.42 trillion industry operates, with a staggering $53 billion stolen annually, all under the protection of outdated IRS codes. The Docuseries will be released globally July 10th, 2025.

Follow the The Religion Business HERE:
Website: www.thereligionbusiness.com
Instagram: @religionbusiness   
X: @religionbiz

#thereligionbusiness
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Swedish Pastor Called Me a Socialist… So I Brought Him on Instagram Live to Say It to My Face
episodes.description:
This conversation is just a preview of what’s coming 👇

🎥 Our 7-part docuseries drops July 10th — exposing the corruption, coverups, and cash flow inside some of the most powerful churches and non profits in the world.

episodes.title: All things TRB and Broken Shepherd
Broken Shepherds Podcast #5
episodes.description:
Introducing Broken Shepherds
The app that empowers accountability in nonprofit leadership. Whether it's faith-based or community organizations, Broken Shepherds helps ensure transparency, integrity, and trust.
Bringing accountability to leadership everywhere.

episodes.title: The Religion Business docuseries - Official Trailer
episodes.description: The official 'The Religion Business' trailer teases a powerful, investigative documentary series exposing the deep financial intricacies of the religious and nonprofit sectors—particularly institutional Christianity in the United States. This 7-part docuseries reveals how a $1.42 trillion industry operates, with a staggering $53 billion stolen annually, all under the protection of outdated IRS codes. The Docuseries will be released globally Summer 2025.

episodes.title: 004 - Defining the Arena
episodes.description: Docuseries director Nathan Apffel and Executive Producer Chris Ayoub discuss the arena's they are playing in regards the docuseries and technology solutions. Equally as important, they discuss the arena's they have decided not to play in.

episodes.title: 003 - Peter Clark & the nonprofit arena
episodes.description: Nathan Apffel speaks with Peter Clark, a globally experienced entrepreneur communicator, educator, producer, director and academic background in new media, international development and non-formal education.

episodes.title: 002 - Preachers N sneakers
episodes.description: The Religion Business's Nathan Apffel and Chris Ayoub sit down with the founder of the instagram account Preachers N sneakers, Ben Kirby, to discuss the success of his cheeky instagram account that has garnered millions of likes and comments. What do shoes have to do with Christianity? Everything... or nothing.

episodes.title: 001-'The Arena' with broken shepherds. Nathan Apffel and Chris Ayoub sit down to discuss the why.
episodes.description: Nathan Apffel and Chris Ayoub sit down the discuss the purpose behind, "The Arena" and deep dive why they are producing the docuseries, "The Religion Business.
